columns.document_type_code: The unique identifier for each document type.
columns.document_type_description: The detailed description of the document type.

Ref_Document_Types.table_description: The table categorizes different types of documents for the system.

columns.role_code: The unique identifier for each role in the system.
columns.role_description: The detailed description of the role assigned to users.

Roles.table_description: The table defines various roles within the document control system.

columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address in the system.
columns.address_details: The detailed information about the specific address.

Addresses.table_description: The table stores address information for document mailing purposes.

columns.document_status_code: The unique identifier for each document status.
columns.document_status_description: The detailed description of the document status.

Ref_Document_Status.table_description: The table categorizes statuses for tracking document progress.

columns.shipping_agent_code: The unique identifier for each shipping agent.
columns.shipping_agent_name: The name of the shipping agent for identification.
columns.shipping_agent_description: The detailed description of the shipping agent.

Ref_Shipping_Agents.table_description: The table lists various shipping agents for document delivery services.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document in the system.
columns.document_status_code: The current status of the document being processed.
columns.document_type_code: The category indicating the type of the document.
columns.shipping_agent_code: The identifier for the shipping agent handling the document.
columns.receipt_date: The date and time when the document was received.
columns.receipt_number: The number corresponding to the document receipt.
columns.other_details: The additional information related to the document.

Documents.table_description: The table manages documents along with their statuses and types.

columns.employee_id: The unique identifier for each employee in the organization.
columns.role_code: The designation assigned to the employee within the organization.
columns.employee_name: The full name of the employee for identification purposes.
columns.other_details: The additional information related to the employee.

Employees.table_description: The table manages employee records and their associated roles.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document draft in the system.
columns.draft_number: The sequential number assigned to each draft of a document.
columns.draft_details: The detailed information describing the content of the draft.

Document_Drafts.table_description: The table manages drafts associated with documents for version control.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document draft.
columns.draft_number: The sequential number assigned to each draft of the document.
columns.copy_number: The specific number representing a copy of the draft.

Draft_Copies.table_description: The table stores copies of drafts for version management and tracking.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document in the circulation record.
columns.draft_number: The specific version number of the document being circulated.
columns.copy_number: The identifier for a specific copy of the document draft.
columns.employee_id: The unique identifier of the employee responsible for circulation.

Circulation_History.table_description: The table records the history of document circulation by employees.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each mailed document.
columns.mailed_to_address_id: The identifier for the address where the document is mailed.
columns.mailing_date: The date and time when the document was mailed.

Documents_Mailed.table_description: The table tracks documents that have been mailed along with their details.
